msg: Remove duplicate "path-nofrag" variable. (Error reported by Saxon.)

author: quinlan
msg: bug 3494: rewrite NO_DNS_FOR_FROM to use DNS-in-background code

author: crossley
msg: Test if an id attribute exists first, rather than prepare the default id,
then test if it already exists.
This enables Saxon to be used for documents that do have section id attributes.
(However it still fails on other documents, due to Issue: FOR-256)

author: crossley
msg: Make it easier to use Saxon as the XSLT processor.
